title: [Get Started with NTT](/docs/products/native-token-transfers/get-started/)
content: Understand the fundamental concepts and benefits of Wormhole's Native Token Transfer (NTT) for directly moving native assets across connected blockchains..

title: [Implement NTT](/docs/products/native-token-transfers/guides/deploy-to-evm/)
content: Integrate Wormhole's Native Token Transfer functionality into your application to enable direct cross-chain movement of native assets.
